title:
I have seen in previous columns that there was once an airfield near where Independence Mall exists. Do you have any information about this airfield or any others in the Wilmington area?



By the way, My Reporter is great.  Thanks for the hard work!
text: Hello. Thanks for your nice comments about MyReporter. Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14251
